description: Episode of Series "History of the Motion Picture". A horror tale about a vampire who stalks his victims in the deepening shadows of the night. An edited version of the 1922 German silent motion picture, Nosferatu (Dracula), directed by F. W. Murnau, with commentary. Cast features Max Schreck as Dracula.
